meanings.definition: Flour or meal made from grain and used to make bread.
meanings.sent1: The baker used fresh breadstuff to make delicious loaves.
meanings.sent2: She bought various breadstuff from the bakery for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The breadstuff decided to become toast and fulfill its destiny.
meanings.sent4: The breadstuff was the foundation of a warm and welcoming home.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked breadstuff filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Any kind of food made from flour or meal.
meanings.sent1: The picnic basket was filled with tasty breadstuff for the outing.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed a variety of breadstuff at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: The breadstuff at the party disappeared faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm slice of breadstuff.
meanings.sent5: The breadstuff on the table tempted everyone with its delicious scent.
